caption.p: Membrane stabilizing activity of ethanol extract of M. longipes root and Q. gomeziana leaves. Values are expressed as mean ± SEM (n = 3); * p < 0.05 are statistically significant comparison with acetyl salicylic acid followed by Dunnett’s test. ASA = Acetyl salicylic acid; EEMLR = Ethanol extract of M. longipes root; EEQGL = Ethanol extract of Q. gomeziana leaves .
